Uses of Package
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock

Packages that use org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl This package contains the base classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock Locking facility used to control access to variables when there are serializable scopes in the process.  
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock used by org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
IAeVariableLockCallback
          Callback interface for reporting that an object's request for locking of one or more variables has been successful.
IAeVariableLocker
          Describes a facility for locking access to variables in order to support the concept of serializable scopes.
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock used by org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.lock
AeLockHolder
          Impl of the lock holder interface that allows multiple owners
AeLockRequest
          Describes the request for a variable locking.
AeVariableLocker
          Provides a locking facility for use in controlling access to variables when there are serializable scopes in the process.
IAeLockerSerializationNames
          Defines constants for AeLockerSerializer and AeLockerDeserializer.
IAeVariableLockCallback
          Callback interface for reporting that an object's request for locking of one or more variables has been successful.
IAeVariableLocker
          Describes a facility for locking access to variables in order to support the concept of serializable scopes.
